rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that transitions into a spacious living area. The design incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows on the eastern side to maximize natural light, following Vastu guidelines.
The central open space designed for joint family living. Features floor-to-ceiling windows on the northern and eastern walls to enhance light and ventilation, in adherence with Vastu principles.
A dining area integrated within the living space. Natural lighting is provided via floor-to-ceiling windows on the eastern side to maintain a warm and inviting ambience.

The kitchen is designed with an open plan adjoining the dining area. Floor-to-ceiling windows on the southern wall ensure ample daylight and cross ventilation. The layout respects local building norms.
A well-appointed master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows facing north to capture soft light. The design incorporates Vastu considerations for tranquility and good sleep.

A secondary bedroom designed with floor-to-ceiling windows facing east to optimize natural light, ideal for joint family members. The room respects Vastu principles by ensuring a clear view of the rising sun.
Modern bathroom design featuring adequate ventilation and natural light where possible. It is strategically placed to ensure privacy while aligning with local building norms.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window in the living room and master bedroom for enhanced natural light.
A seamless transition between entrance hall and living area, facilitating smooth movement and ventilation.
An opening to maintain open plan flow while preserving individual functionalities of each space.
Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring ample daylight in the kitchen.
Provides privacy and ensures good flow between the master bedroom and private corridor areas.

swimming_pool.description: An expansive swimming pool integrated into the backyard design, providing a recreational area for joint family members. The pool is designed with Brutalist elements and aligns with local aesthetic norms.

exterior_elements.description: A patio area adjoining the living space, enhancing natural ventilation and communal family interactions.
